Room.Name: Staircase
Room.ShortDescription: The stairway is much darker and quite dusty. Obviously not used much.
Room.LongDescription: As you stand here on the stairway, you realize the air is much hotter down below than the air above you. Coming from below you hear the sound of a heavy hammer striking an anvil. Each step on the stairs produces a squeak as you put your weight on it. A ghostly voice speaks to you. You would be well served to talk with the apparition.
